name: ActiveCallWithTrace
title: GRPC
ActiveCallWithTrace
description: Stackdriver Trace instrumentation of GRPC by patching GRPC::ActiveCall class. Intercept each GRPC request and create a Trace span with basic request information.

methods.name: request_response
title: GRPC
ActiveCallWithTrace#request_response
methods.description: Override GRPC::ActiveCall#request_response method. Wrap the original method with a trace span that will get submitted with the overall request trace span tree.
